comment: I am starting a church and we are called the Elect, even though we may not live in the same area this is exactly what the Apostle Paul did by communicating in writing to the churches he established what they needed to know. Please let me know what you think
amr:
# ::snt I am starting a church and we are called the Elect, even though we may not live in the same area this is exactly what the Apostle Paul did by communicating in writing to the churches he established what they needed to know. Please let me know what you think
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (s / start-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (c / church))
            :op2 (c2 / call-01
                  :ARG1 ii
                  :ARG2 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (e / elect-01)))
            :concession (p2 / possible-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (l / live-01
                        :ARG0 (w / we)
                        :location (a2 / area
                              :ARG1-of (s2 / same-01)))))
      :snt2 (d / do-02
            :ARG0 (p3 / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Apostle"
                        :op2 "Paul"))
            :ARG1 (t / this)
            :mod (e2 / exact)
            :manner (c3 / communicate-01
                  :ARG0 p3
                  :ARG2 (c4 / church)
                  :manner (w2 / write-01
                        :ARG0 p3
                        :ARG2 c4)
                  :purpose (e3 / establish-01
                        :ARG0 p3
                        :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                              :ARG1-of (k / know-01
                                    :ARG0 c4
                                    :ARG1-of (n2 / need-01
                                          :ARG0 c4))))))
      :snt3 (l2 / let-know-07
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG2 (t3 / thing
                  :ARG1-of (t4 / think-01
                        :ARG0 y))))
